name: survive the next wave
description:
Survive the next wave is a simple third person zombie horde shooter. The goal of the player is to kill as many zombies as possible. Between the zombie waves, the player can buy new weapons and increase his chances of survival.

features
- Horde system
- 6 different weapons
- Simple gameplay with no frills

controls
- R - reload
- Left mouse button - Shoot
- F - Buy weapon
- ESC - menu
